General.Name: Aspeed Technology
General.Description: ASPEED Technology Inc. operates as a fabless integrated circuit (IC) design company in Taiwan, China, the United States, and internationally. It designs, develops, produces, markets, and sells multimedia and computer peripherals ICs, and consumer electronics. The company offers server management product lines; AV over IP extension products; BMC, a processor with 2D graphic and logic control features to remotely monitor and manage host systems; Bridge IC, a small processor with memory and storage built in; Platform Firmware Resilience IC to provide firmware security on the enterprise platform; and Cupola360, a spherical image processor for 360-degree cameras, as well as Cupola360" software kit, a companion software solution. It also provides research and development, technical, and software design services, as well as wholesale of information software; retail and service industry; international trade; intellectual property; product design; and other industrial and commercial services. ASPEED Technology Inc. was incorporated in 2004 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 1, Gongdao 5th Road, Hsinchu City, Taiwan, 30069
